Name: SYS_FUNCTION
Label: Function
Description:
Function command register. Following commands are supported:
Value 9901 - Reset
Value 8801 - Factory reset
Value 7701 - Testing mode
Value 66xx - Invoke error
Value 5501 - Invoke watchdog reset
Vaue 2 - Restart
Value 1 - Run

Name: SYS_AVERAGING
Label: Average samples
Description: Number of temperature samples to average to get result.

Name: COM_MB_BAUD_RATE
Label: Modbus baud rate
Description:
Modbus RTU serial port baud rate
Allowed values: 
Value 0 - Default 19200 - Default 19200 baud/s.
Value 1 - 300 - 300 baud/s.
Value 2 - 600 - 600 baud/s.
Value 3 - 1200 - 1200 baud/s.
Value 4 - 2400 - 2400 baud/s.
Value 5 - 4800 - 4800 baud/s.
Value 6 - 9600 - 9600 baud/s.
Value 7 - 19200 - 19200 baud/s.
Value 8 - 38400 - 38400 baud/s.
Value 9 - 57600 - 57600 baud/s.
Value 10 - 115200 - 115200 baud/s.

Name: COM_MB_PARITY_STOP
Label: Modbus settings
Description:
Modbus RTU serial port parity
Allowed values: 
Value 0 - 8-N-1 - 1 stop bit, none parity.
Value 1 - 8-E-1 - 1 stop bit, even parity.
Value 2 - 8-O-1 - 1 stop bit, odd parity.
Value 3 - 8-N-2 - 2 stop bits, none parity.
Value 4 - 8-E-2 - 2 stop bits, even parity.
Value 5 - 8-O-2 - 2 stop bits, odd parity.

Name: RTD_TEMPER_1
Label: Temperature 1 (fixed)
Description: Measured temperature at input 1 in hundredths of centigrade

Name: RTD_TEMPER_2
Label: Temperature 2 (fixed)
Description: Measured temperature at input 2 in hundredths of centigrade

Name: RTD_TEMPER_6
Label: Temperature 6 (fixed)
Description: Measured temperature at input 6 in hundredths of centigrade

Name: RTD_TYPE_1
Label: Sensor type 1
Description:
Sensor type settings at input 1
Allowed values: 
Value 0 - PT100 - PT100 is used.
Value 1 - PT1000 - PT1000 is used.

Name: GEN_UPTIME
Label: Uptime
Description: Time since last power-up

Name: GEN_CONVERSIONS
Label: Number of conversions
Description: Number of conversions on all channels

Name: GEN_TEST
Label: Test register
Description: Internal testing purpose

Name: GEN_STATUS
Label: Status register
Description:
Binary map of different status flags
Meaning of respective bits: 
Bit 0 - Generic error - Any error flag.
Bit 4 - RTD 1 open - Open circuit at RTD input 1.
Bit 5 - RTD 2 open - Open circuit at RTD input 2.
Bit 6 - RTD 3 open - Open circuit at RTD input 3.
Bit 7 - RTD 4 open - Open circuit at RTD input 4.
Bit 8 - RTD 5 open - Open circuit at RTD input 5.
Bit 9 - RTD 6 open - Open circuit at RTD input 6.
Bit 10 - RTD 1 short - Short circuit at RTD input 1.
Bit 11 - RTD 2 short - Short circuit at RTD input 2.
Bit 12 - RTD 3 short - Short circuit at RTD input 3.
Bit 13 - RTD 4 short - Short circuit at RTD input 4.
Bit 14 - RTD 5 short - Short circuit at RTD input 5.
Bit 15 - RTD 6 short - Short circuit at RTD input 6.
Bit 16 - Configuration flash error - Error when working with configuration memory.
Bit 17 - Low voltage - Detected low power supply voltage.
Bit 18 - Modbus timeout - No modbus communication for timeout period.
Bit 19 - Testing mode - Testing mode is enabled.

Name: GEN_IO_INPUT
Label: Input signals
Description:
Set of input signals. 
Bits 0-4 - Modbus address offset
Bits 5-8 - Bootstrap pins
Bit 9 - Pushbutton

Name: GEN_VDDA_REF
Label: Analog supply
Description: Measured analog reference voltage

Name: GEN_SUPPLY_VOLTAGE
Label: Power voltage
Description: Measured power supply voltage

Name: FACT_SERIAL_NUMBER
Label: Serial number
Description:
Serial number of product with common device ID in format xxyyzzzz.
xx - year of production
yy - month of production
zzzz - serial incremental number of the product

Name: FACT_DEVICE_ID
Label: Product number
Description: Product family identification.

Name: FACT_HW_REVISION
Label: Hardware version
Description:
Hardware revision of the device defined as 0xAAAABBBB:
AAAA - major part
BBBB - minor part

Name: FACT_BOOT_REVISION
Label: Bootloader version
Description:
Firmware revision of the bootloader as number 0xAAAABBBB:
AAAA - major version
BBBB - minor version

Name: FIRM_REVISION
Label: Firmware version
Description: Firmware revision of the current application image as an incremental number. See list of FW revision or release notes for respective features.

Name: FIRM_ASSEMBLY_INFO
Label: Assembly date
Description:
Assembly information of the current application in format xxxxyyzz:
xxxx - year of FW build
yy - month of FW build
zz - day of FW build

Name: FIRM_APP_CHECKSUM
Label: CRC checksum
Description: CRC checksum of the current application

Name: FIRM_APP_SIZE
Label: Firmware size
Description: Firmware size of the current application in bytes

Name: DBG_WRITES_CONF
Label: Configuration writes
Description: Number of writes into internal configuration flash (size 4kB, entry 128 B, total endurance 10000 * 4096 / 128 = 320000)

Name: CALIB_MODE
Label: Calibration mode
Description: Writing 1111 stores the current calibration into one-time programmable memory

Name: CALIB_RESERVED
Label: Reserved
Description: Reserved for future use

Name: CALIB_SCALE_1
Label: PT100 gain calibration
Description: Gain calibration for PT100 sensors

Name: CALIB_OFFSET_1
Label: PT100 zero calibration
Description: Zero calibration for PT100 sensors

Name: CALIB_SCALE_2
Label: PT1000 gain calibration
Description: Gain calibration for PT1000 sensors

Name: CALIB_OFFSET_2
Label: PT1000 zero calibration
Description: Zero calibration for PT1000 sensors
